put.description:

post.summary: Endpoint to support the creation of official visits.
post.description:
Requires one of the following roles:
* ROLE_OFFICIAL_VISITS_ADMIN
* ROLE_OFFICIAL_VISITS__RW

parameters.name: prisonCode
parameters.description: The prison code

201.description: The response containing the details of the created official visit

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

post.summary: Endpoint to search for official visit summaries for given search criteria.
post.description:
Requires one of the following roles:
* ROLE_OFFICIAL_VISITS_ADMIN
* ROLE_OFFICIAL_VISITS__R
* ROLE_OFFICIAL_VISITS_RW

parameters.name: prisonCode
parameters.description: The prison code

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Zero-based page index (0..N)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

post.summary: Migrate a single official visit and its visitors
post.description:
Migrate a visit and all visitors

Requires one of the following roles:
* OFFICIAL_VISITS_MIGRATION
* OFFICIAL_VISITS_ADMIN

200.description: The visit and visitor ID mappings between NOMIS and DPS

400.description: The request failed validation with invalid or missing data

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

post.description:
Migrate a visit time slot and its associated visit slots, locations and capacity limits

Requires one of the following roles:
* OFFICIAL_VISITS_MIGRATION
* OFFICIAL_VISITS_ADMIN

200.description: The time slot and associated visit slots was migrated successfully

400.description: The request failed validation with invalid or missing data

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.summary: Endpoint to return the official visits booked for a prison - TRIAL ONLY
get.description:
Requires one of the following roles:
* ROLE_OFFICIAL_VISITS_ADMIN
* ROLE_OFFICIAL_VISITS__R
* ROLE_OFFICIAL_VISITS__RW

parameters.name: prisonCode
parameters.description: The prison code

200.description: List of visits booked at the prison

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.summary: Endpoint to return reference data for a provided group key, sorted by display sequence and description
get.description:
Requires one of the following roles:
* ROLE_OFFICIAL_VISITS_ADMIN
* ROLE_OFFICIAL_VISITS__R
* ROLE_OFFICIAL_VISITS__RW

parameters.name: groupCode
parameters.description: The group code of the reference codes to load

parameters.name: activeOnly
parameters.description: Whether to only return active codes or not, defaults to true

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.summary: Endpoint to return all official visits for a prisoner between the specified  visit dates and  current term
get.description:
Requires one of the following roles:
* OFFICIAL_VISITS_MIGRATION
* OFFICIAL_VISITS_ADMIN

parameters.name: prisonerNumber
parameters.description: The prisoner Number

parameters.name: currentTermOnly
parameters.description: Is current term only?

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: The from date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: The to date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD).

200.description: List of all Official visit details

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.summary: Endpoint to return a paged list of all official visit IDs
get.description:
Requires one of the following roles:
* OFFICIAL_VISITS_MIGRATION
* OFFICIAL_VISITS_ADMIN

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Zero-based page index (0..N)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

200.description: A paginated list of all official visit IDs

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.summary: Endpoint to return one official visit by ID for reconciliation

* OFFICIAL_VISITS_ADMIN

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.description:
Requires one of the following roles:
* OFFICIAL_VISITS_ADMIN

get.summary: Get the approved contacts for a prisoner for official or social visits

* ROLE_OFFICIAL_VISITS_ADMIN
* ROLE_OFFICIAL_VISITS__R
* ROLE_OFFICIAL_VISITS__RW

parameters.name: relationshipType
parameters.description: The relationship type should be S for social or O for official

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.summary: Get an official visit by prison code and ID
get.description:
Get the full details of an official visit, its visitors and prisoner details

Requires one of the following roles:
* ROLE_OFFICIAL_VISITS_ADMIN
* ROLE_OFFICIAL_VISITS__R
* ROLE_OFFICIAL_VISITS_RW

parameters.name: prisonCode
parameters.description: The prison code

parameters.name: officialVisitId
parameters.description: The official visit ID

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.summary: Endpoint to return the available slots for official visits for a prison for a given date range.
get.description:
Requires one of the following roles:
* ROLE_OFFICIAL_VISITS_ADMIN
* ROLE_OFFICIAL_VISITS__R
* ROLE_OFFICIAL_VISITS__RW

parameters.name: prisonCode
parameters.description: The prison code

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: The from date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: The to date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: videoOnly
parameters.description: Boolean flag. A value of 'true' will only return video reservable slots.

200.description: List of available slots at the prison

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

CreateOfficialVisitRequest.description: The request with the official visit details

visitDate.description: The date the official visit will take place

startTime.description: The start time of the official visit

endTime.description: The end time of the official visit

dpsLocationId.description: The DPS location ID where the official visit is to take place

staffNotes.description: Notes for staff that will not be shared on movement slips

prisonerNotes.description: Notes for prisoners that may be shared on movement slips

searchTypeCode.description: Search type code relates to the search that will be done on the prisoner after the visit

visitorTypeCode.description: The visitor type code (CONTACT, OPV, PRISONER)

contactId.description: The contact ID for the visitor

prisonerContactId.description: The prisoner contact ID for the visitor

leadVisitor.description: Set to true if this is the lead visitor

assistedVisit.description: Set to true if this visitor requires an assisted visit

assistedNotes.description: Any required assistance notes to keep about this visitor.  Will be ignored if assisted visit is not true

visitorEquipment.description: Details of any equipment the visitor will bring to the visit.

description.description: A description of the equipment the visitor will bring

OfficialVisitSummarySearchRequest.description: The request with the official visit summary search details

searchTerm.description: The search term can be a prisoner number, name or partial name.  Must be a minimum of 2 characters or not provided.

startDate.description: The earliest date the official visits will start

endDate.description: The latest date the official visits will end

visitTypes.description: The visit types to search for

visitStatuses.description: The visit statuses to search for

prisonerNumbers.description: The prisoner numbers to search for

locationIds.description: The location identifiers to search for

prisonCode.description: The 3 letter code for the prison

visitDate.description: The date the official visit takes place

startTime.description: The start time of the official visit

endTime.description: The end time of the official visit

dpsLocationId.description: The DPS location ID where the official visit takes place

visitSlotId.description: The prison visit slot identifier for the official visit slot

staffNotes.description: Notes for staff that will not be shared on movement slips

prisonerNotes.description: Notes for prisoners that may be shared on movement slips

numberOfVisitors.description: The number of visitors attending the official visit

createdBy.description: The name of the user who created the official visit

createdTime.description: The date and time the official visit was created

updatedBy.description: The name of the last user who updated the official visit

updatedTime.description: The date and time the official visit was last updated

prisoner.description: The details of the prisoner being visited

firstName.description: The official visitor - Prisoner first name

lastName.description: The official visitor prisoner last name

dateOfBirth.description: The official visitor - Prisoner date of birth

prisonVisitSlotId.description: The DPS visit slot ID - this provides the location, start time and end time via configuration data

prisonCode.description: The prison code where the visit takes place

offenderBookId.description: The offender book ID to echo back. It will be stored in DPS against the visit.

currentTerm.description: If this visits relates to the current or latest term (booking) in prison true, else false.

visitDate.description: The date the official visit will take place

startTime.description: The start time for this official visit

endTime.description: The end time for this official visit

dpsLocationId.description: The DPS location where the visit takes place.

visitStatusCode.description: The DPS visit status code. The Syscon migration service will map the NOMIS state to a value in this enumerated type.

visitTypeCode.description: The DPS visit type code. For migrated NOMIS visits this will default to type UNKNOWN. Other values are IN_PERSON, VIDEO, or TELEPHONE.

searchTypeCode.description: The prisoner search type code. Maps to the same reference code values in both NOMIS and DPS.

visitCompletionCode.description: The DPS visit completion code. Default is NORMAL if not supplied.

overrideBanStaffUsername.description: The staff username who authorised an override for a ban for this visit

visitOrderNumber.description: The visit order number (if present) for the official visit

createDateTime.description: The data and time the record was created

createUsername.description: The username who created the row

modifyDateTime.description: The date and time the record was last amended

modifyUsername.description: The username who last modified the row

MigrateVisitor.description: The details of an official visitor

offenderVisitVisitorId.description: The NOMIS offender visit visitor ID

personId.description: The NOMIS person ID (same as contactId) for this visitor

firstName.description: The first name of the visitor

lastName.description: The last name of the visitor

relationshipTypeCode.description: The relationship type OFFICIAL or SOCIAL. Default is null if not known.

relationshipToPrisoner.description: The relationship code between visitor and prisoner, from NOMIS reference data. A null value will indicate no relationship.

groupLeaderFlag.description: Set to true if this person is the lead visitor. Defaults to false if not supplied.

assistedVisitFlag.description: Set to true if this person requires assistance at the visit. Defaults to false if not supplied.

commentText.description: The visitor comment text from NOMIS

attendanceCode.description: The visitor attendance code (ATTENDED or ABSENT). A null indicates no attendance was added.

createDateTime.description: The data and time the record was created

createUsername.description: The username who created the row

modifyDateTime.description: The date and time the record was last amended

modifyUsername.description: The username who last modified the row

nomisId.description: The unique ID for this data item provided in the request

dpsId.description: The unique ID created in the DPS official visits service

MigrateVisitResponse.description: The migration response for an official visit and the visitors attending

visit.description: The pair of IDs for this visit

visitors.description: The list of ID pairs for each visitor on this visit

prisoner.description: The pair of IDs for the prisoner on this visit. NOMS ID is used as the NOMIS ID, as it has no other ID

MigrateVisitConfigRequest.description: Request to migrate a day and time slot for a prison and its associated visit slots from NOMIS

prisonCode.description: The 3-letter agy_loc_id from NOMIS where this visit time slot exists

dayCode.description: The 3-letter day of the week code where this slot falls in this prison.

timeSlotSeq.description: The time slot sequence in NOMIS. This is used to build a response object for cross-reference

startTime.description: The start time for this visit time slot

endTime.description: The end time for this visit time slot

effectiveDate.description: The date from which this row will be effective

expiryDate.description: The date from which this row will no longer be effective

visitSlots.description: The list of visit slots which are linked to this time slot

createDateTime.description: The data and time the record was created

createUsername.description: The username who created the record

modifyDateTime.description: The date and time the record was last amended

modifyUsername.description: The username who last modified the record

agencyVisitSlotId.description: Unique ID for this visit slot in NOMIS. For building a response to cross-reference with a DPS visit slot.

internalLocationId.description: The internal location ID from NOMIS. Information only

locationKey.description: The location key from NOMIS. Information only

dpsLocationId.description: The DPS location ID (mapped from the NOMIS internal location ID)

maxGroups.description: The maximum number of groups that can be booked into this visit slot. Effectively, the max visits limit for the slot.

maxAdults.description: The maximum number of adults who can be booked into this visits slot.

maxVideoSessions.description: The maximum number of video sessions that can be booked into this visits slot.

createDateTime.description: The data and time the record was created

createUsername.description: The username who created the record

modifyDateTime.description: The date and time the record was last amended

modifyUsername.description: The username who last modified the record

MigrateVisitConfigResponse.description: The migration response for an official visit time slot and its visit slots

prisonCode.description: The 3-letter agy_loc_id from NOMIS where this time slot exists

dayCode.description: The 3-letter day of the week code where this slot exists in this prison.

timeSlotSeq.description: The time slot sequence from NOMIS

dpsTimeSlotId.description: The ID created in DPS for this prison time slot

visitSlots.description: List of NOMIS and DPS IDs for the visit slots created

ReferenceDataItem.description: Describes the details of a reference code

referenceDataId.description: An internally-generated unique identifier for this reference code.

groupCode.description: The group name for related reference codes.

code.description: The code for this reference data

description.description: A fuller description of the reference code

displaySequence.description: The default order configured for the reference code, lowest number first.

enabled.description: Whether the reference code is still in use. Old reference codes are maintained for compatability with legacy data.

dpsLocationId.description: The DPS location ID where the visit is taking place

offenderBookId.description: The offender booking ID in NOMIS

offenderVisitId.description: The offender visit ID in NOMIS (only present for migrated bookings)

contactId.description: The contact ID of the person visiting

relationshipType.description: The relationship type for this visitor (OFFICIAL or SOCIAL)

attendanceCode.description: The visitor attendance code, either ABSENT, ATTENDED or null if not recorded.

officialVisitId.description: The ID for an Official visits

contactId.description: The unique identifier for the prisoner contact

lastName.description: The last name of the contact

firstName.description: The first name of the contact

relationshipTypeCode.description: Coded value indicating either a social or official contact

relationshipToPrisonerCode.description: The relationship to the prisoner. A code from SOCIAL_RELATIONSHIP or OFFICIAL_RELATIONSHIP reference data groups depending on the relationship type.

isApprovedVisitor.description: Indicates whether the contact is an approved visitor

isNextOfKin.description: Is this contact the prisoner's next of kin?

isEmergencyContact.description: Is this contact the prisoner's emergency contact?

isRelationshipActive.description: Is this prisoner's contact relationship active?

currentTerm.description: Is this relationship active for the current booking?

isStaff.description: Whether the contact is a staff member

titleCode.description: The title code for the contact

titleDescription.description: The description of the title code, if present

middleNames.description: The middle names of the contact, if any

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the contact

deceasedDate.description: The date the contact deceased, if known

flat.description: Flat number in the address, if any

countryDescription.description: Flag to indicate whether this address indicates no fixed address

noFixedAddress.description: Flag to indicate whether this address indicates no fixed address

primaryAddress.description: If true this address should be considered as the primary residential address

mailAddress.description: If true this address should be considered for sending mail to

phoneType.description: Type of the latest phone number

phoneTypeDescription.description: Description of the type of the latest phone number

phoneNumber.description: The latest phone number, if there are any

extNumber.description: The extension number of the latest phone number

visitSlotId.description: The Official visit - visitor slot slot identifier for the official visit takes place

visitorConcernNotes.description: The Official visit - visitor concern notes

searchTypeCode.description: The Official visit Search Level type

createdBy.description: The Official visit created by User

updatedTime.description: The Official visit updated date time

updatedBy.description: The Official visit updated by user

officialVisitors.description: The Official visit updated by user

visitorTypeCode.description: The Official visitor Visit Type code

relationshipTypeCode.description: The Official visitor relationship type code

relationshipTypeDescription.description: The Official visitor relationship Type Description

leadVisitor.description: The Official visitor - is lead visitor

assistedVisit.description: The Official visitor - is assisted visit

createdBy.description: The Official visitor created by user

createdTime.description: The Official visitor created date time

updatedBy.description: The Official visitor updated by user

updatedTime.description: The Official visitor updated date time

offenderVisitVisitorId.description: The Official visitor offender visit visitor id

assistanceNotes.description: Notes on whether the visitor requires any assistance

visitSlotId.description: The prison visit slot identifier for the official visit slot

timeSlotId.description: The prison time slot identifier for the official visit slot

prisonCode.description: The prison code where the visit takes place

dayCode.description: The 3-letter day of the week code where this slot falls in this prison.

dayDescription.description: The day of the week code where this slot falls in this prison.

visitDate.description: The date for the official visit slot

startTime.description: The start time for the official visit slot

endTime.description: The end time for the official visit slot

dpsLocationId.description: The DPS location where the official visit takes place for the slot

availableVideoSessions.description: The available video sessions for official visit slot

availableAdults.description: The available adults for official visit slot

availableGroups.description: The available groups for official visit slot

locationDescription.description: The description of the location where this slot exists
